concept.title: Source Path
concept.shortdesc: This document describes the role of the source path in processing backlog transactions in Karaf incidents.

conbody.p: The source path is the full path to the folder where the transaction files to be processed are stored. Ideally, this should be a temporary folder created for the purpose of clearing the backlog. Using an incident number as the folder name might be a good idea to keep things simple and organized.
